definition: counter for the display of goods/(Tw) container (for freight transport)

sentences.english: The lengths of our containers range from 10 to 40 feet.
sentences.chinese: 我们货柜的长度从10英尺到40英尺不等。

sentences.english: Is it money-saving or life-risking to sleep on the hammock under the container-truck?
sentences.chinese: 女子在货柜车底挂吊床睡觉，省钱还是玩命？

sentences.english: That train has 57 flat cars and 12 box cars.
sentences.chinese: 那列火车有57个平板车厢，12个货柜车厢。

sentences.english: It's so bad now that truck drivers are going on strike over the price of diesel.
sentences.chinese: 它的那么差，现在货柜车司机仍在进行罢工柴油价格。

sentences.english: Place some wadded up newspaper in the bottom of your container to set the foam blocks on top of.
sentences.chinese: 一些地方絮片了报纸放在你的货柜设定泡沫大厦顶部。

sentences.english: The red rectangle is a container truck.
These boxes were usually old freight cars that were almost soundproof .
sentences.chinese: 这些包厢通常采用几乎能隔音的旧火车货柜。

sentences.english: S. profit down for you to do this 20-foot container.
sentences.chinese: 压低我们的利润来为你做这个20尺的货柜。

sentences.english: Containerization has become the main stream of marine transportation today.
sentences.chinese: 今日海洋运输中，货柜化运输已成为主流。

sentences.english: The goods can only be loaded in a 20ft container.
sentences.chinese: “只能装20尺货柜”这句话的英文怎么说？

sentences.english: Container Terminal , Service Quality , Quality Function Deployment.
sentences.chinese: 货柜集散站，服务品质，品质机能展开。

sentences.english: Per month to Europe and the United States Export 20 container products.
sentences.chinese: 每个月可向欧美地区出口20个货柜的产品。

sentences.english: Checks loading/unloading of containers on board of vessel and certifies physical integrity of containers.
sentences.chinese: 检查船上货柜装卸情况，并证明货柜完整无缺。

sentences.english: Checks loading/unloading of containers on board of vessel and certifies physical integrity of containers.
sentences.chinese: 检查船上货柜装卸情况，并证明货柜完整无缺。

sentences.english: We have one of the busiest container ports in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我们亦有世界上其中一个最繁忙的货柜港口。

definition: to load sth onto a ship etc
to load or unload/to transfer/to assemble and disassemble
